topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/553461476368723108fb0c00#post_553461476368723108fb0c00

I find religion fascinating to read about (Even the extremists sides) because it also shows a perspective of how alone mankind feels in the grand scheme of things and how such a simple concept as a highly superior being overseeing our creations makes the Universe smaller and it can even make several people with nothing in common to unite under a similar banner.

And there's also something recomforting for other people that there's a place for everyone when they die or that delivers punishment to those that deserve it.

I personally don't think such things exist _in this plane of reality_. I believe in different Universes and Dimensions and that those dimensions sometimes cross with ours and some of that influence comes over.
